amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, requires the President to provide yearly to Congress a report that measures the effectiveness of the civil nuclear cooperation agreement in achieving the goals and objectives described in the bill, and assesses the relative level of India's nuclear fissile material production compared to the previous year.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 109-599 to provide Congress with the ability to assess, to the extent possible, wheth er annual levels of India's nuclear fissile production may imply a possible violation of Article I of the Nuclear Nonproliferation Treaty.
